column1: Looking forward to attending the Martin Luther King Jr. Holiday Breakfast tomorrow in Charlotte!

I toured the @NASCAR Universal Technical Institute in Mooresville. This unique school teaches students technical education needed for booming careers. We must keep investing in practical skills-based education. Thanks @NASCAR UTI! https://t.co/R0Q6qxWQ65
It was an honor to attend the Union County Crimestoppers BBQ! Dedicated crimestoppers & supporters enable our law enforcement to solve crimes and keep our communities safe. https://t.co/DC8v9xLgJc
I spoke with @AbigailCBN about #impeachment. Catch me on Faith Nation at 6PM ET on CBN.
Religious freedom is an essential part of the American spirit.  I am thankful for the freedoms we have in this country and for those who defend them. #ReligiousFreedomDay
Good news for Lumberton. I continue to work with FEMA to get the 9th district the resources we need to recover from Hurricane Florence and other natural disasters. https://t.co/ncJL6IHUt1

.@realDonaldTrump just signed Phase 1 of the #ChinaTradeDeal w/ benefits from farm to finance. This helps farmers by increasing ag exports & improves market access for US banks while keeping China accountable for the first time. Win for North Carolina America & the President!
. @RepAdams & I partnered to argue that a growing Charlotte should receive vital preparedness funding👇👇  https://t.co/kdx3gmRk3q

Charlotteans deserve preparedness grants that ready us for the worst-case-scenario. I spoke at a @HomelandGOP hearing about why Charlotte didn't received this funding in 2019 or 2020👇👇 https://t.co/eZIwEYORGn
Enjoyed meeting with the new @SBAgov Administrator Jovita Carranza.  Congratulations on your confirmation Madam Administrator. https://t.co/3oOdT8eOTg
I announced FEMA grants for Cumberland County 👇👇  https://t.co/aIfJXzXR07

I announced the winner of the 2019 Congressional App Challenge today 👇👇  Thanks to all who participated--I continue to be impressed with the talent of the 9th district's students!  https://t.co/cVaD6upR5Z
I spoke out against Democrat's reckless H.Con.Res 83 on the House floor 👇👇👇 https://t.co/vjqxPrmoWV
See my statement on H.Con.Res 83 regarding the War Powers Resolution 👇👇 https://t.co/vlqZm85Ro1

Today we honor the brave men & women of law enforcement for their daily sacrifice to protect and defend our communities. Thank you federal state and local officers--we all depend on you!  If you see a law enforcement member today thank them!  #LawEnforcementAppreciationDay https://t.co/8isuJgKCZg
https://t.co/Rf1T28DXzp

Our state & communities depend on local businesses. I enjoyed the opportunity to speak with business leaders at the Charlotte Executive Club about how to sustain our booming economy & ensure any healthcare reforms work for people w/out killing business. Thanks for having me!  👇 https://t.co/Q2kUdrSWP2
Merry Christmas! 🎄 https://t.co/QsShG6aykE
Evidence is clear👉NC needs #USMCANow https://t.co/f3AzMWZlKL
#USMCA promotes #AmericaFirst creates 76000 automotive jobs nationally & supports the 290 automotive manufacturing businesses and their 26000 employees in NC. https://t.co/cPvBx2UcYc

W/ USMCA it'll be easier for NC to export poultry—big news for 150000 North Carolinian poultry workers!  Remember: 80/100 counties in North Carolina are rural & ag is big business.   Farmers need certainty for production/pricing that USMCA gives. https://t.co/CCFlBfN60f
USMCA upgrades trade w/ Canada & Mexico & will be a boon to NC which exports $10.4B annually. @realDonaldTrump negotiated it last year & Dems are finally allowing a vote. https://t.co/ybo3iTzfzl
I will proudly vote for @realDonaldTrump #USMCA.  It's a win for the President America and #NC09!  Here's how (THREAD)👇👇

The articles of impeachment Democrats advance are a self-parody and a laughingstock. They reveal that they have no case and have lost their nerve.   I am voting against this partisan and corrupt abuse of the process of impeachment. See why 👇👇👇  https://t.co/XvkFtaYjhA

It was a privilege to recognize Mr. Bo Biggs of Lumberton as the new Chairman of @NCgoldenLEAF. Bo is a long-term community leader & his agricultural insight make him a fantastic choice to lead this organization that has contributed greatly to NC jobs scholarships and economy. https://t.co/bsfI3idfrZ

I had the honor to speak about the life of work and service of Charlottean Scott Brooks who was senselessly killed on Monday. He ran Brooks' Sandwich House a Charlotte staple with his brother David. My thoughts & prayers continue to be with his family. Rest in peace. https://t.co/Se55NrjZAD

There's no doubt that we need to reform the H-2A temporary agricultural worker program to fill empty farm jobs and support a robust Ag economy but don't fall for the claims that this is the solution. It isn't. It is a mass amnesty program for over 1000000 illegal aliens. 2/2

I'm voting against the amnesty bill H.R.5038. This bill encourages people to cross illegally into the U.S. work illegally and then rewards them with citizenship.   Rewarding lawbreaking without securing the border will only lead to more illegal immigration.1/
Catch my conversation with @bothompsonWBT this morning about the mother of all political faceplants the new NC map and sticking to my values. https://t.co/gqiVFpGKTC

I joined 13 of my colleagues to express our concerns to @esperdod about the new ban on scripture and biblical references on all @usarmy products. The very people who protect our freedom including religious freedom should be free to exercise it. https://t.co/Lg6mLe7Z33

I had only been sworn in for a week when @SpeakerPelosi announced that the House would be bogged down with a deeply flawed and biased impeachment inquiry. I spoke with @AbigailCBN today about my supreme disappointment of the Democrats holding the legislative calendar hostage. https://t.co/VdWNK2eOAg

I stood up for the 55000 Lumbee tribe members @lumbeetribeNC that do not receive federal benefits. We have the chance to change that! I urge my colleagues to pass this practical piece of legislation that is not just a statement but a solution. See my statement for the record👇 https://t.co/SFFDDZQXv3

Proud to show our troops we support them w/ the @RedCross. It is important they know that we appreciate their daily sacrifices especially if it means missing the holiday season with their families. Thank you for your service. #seasonsgreetings #LandoftheFreeBECAUSEoftheBrave https://t.co/O9jReBm9bx

@LumbeeTribeofNC are integral to our NC community and history. Sadly the 55000 members I represent are denied the federal benefits & legal status that other tribes have. Thank you @GKButterfield & @RepRichHudson for introducing the bill to right this fundamentally unfair wrong. https://t.co/I8jbn558RY

From the witness a Democrat: “If you impeach a president - if you make a high crime and misdemeanor out of going to the courts it is an abuse of power. It's YOUR abuse of power. You're doing precisely what you're criticizing the president of doing."

At an ag roundtable w/ @SenDannyBritt I was pleased to hear from farming families who have a tough row to hoe. As one commented last night farmers are the ones who have to buy at retail sell at wholesale & pay freight both ways. They keep us fed & we need to support them. https://t.co/qBTdyVYwGv

I am grateful for DHS Acting Secretary Chad Wolf and the other attendees for putting the safety our of communities first. We must continue to stand for safety and security in North Carolina and against dangerous criminals running free. #immigration #sanctuarycities 2/2 https://t.co/0nwWurko0F

Last week I met w/ @DHS_Wolf & NC officials to discuss the spread of “sanctuary cities” where hardened criminals are released despite a federal detainer. We can't ignore the danger of officials who flout federal law & jeopardize the safety of our communities & law enforcement. 1/ https://t.co/n1z97wheCW
#immigration

It was an honor to speak at Charlotte’s naturalization ceremony today with Judge Cayer. Immigration done right is essential to the American idea and it was truly humbling to see the hard work of these Americans pay off. Congratulations and welcome home! https://t.co/ArRz6yDb23

Great to have the support of the National Taxpayers Union for the Increasing Health Coverage through HRAs Act. My legislation will help hundreds of thousands obtain affordable coverage. #healthreimbursement   https://t.co/D2QxLGzyTD
230 years ago North Carolina officially joined the union! I am proud to represent citizens of this fine robust state. Happy birthday North Carolina! #northcarolina https://t.co/2I6nfFKLJA
Correction: HR 4029: Tribal Access to Homeless Assistance Act
#lumbeetribe

I proudly spoke in support of H.R. 4092 that enables the @LumbeeTribeNC to directly apply for federal Homeless Assistance Grants to provide shelter & other services to their members. The Lumbee are in the best position to help their own members & this bill empowers them to do so https://t.co/BZZYoU4xp8

These days high speed internet is important for communities to prosper especially in rural areas that are often left behind. It is great to see almost 9000 North Carolinians receiving access to the tools needed to improve education and create jobs! #broadband #ruralamerica

Liliana Chavez Uribe defied odds to achieve her dream of serving as Black Hawk Pilot. Her family legally immigrated when she was young. Despite challenges she's now in #texasarmynationalguard in various capacities. Her resilience shows how immigration done right makes us strong. https://t.co/lyOGsTQSVZ

Elizabeth Warren’s $52 trillion govt takeover of healthcare will lead to massive tax increases & crowd out care for vulnerable populations that need it the most. We cannot pretend that these socialist policies are not made at the expense of taxpayers & hardworking Americans.
#impeachmentvote https://t.co/56qib2l0dq

Jo and I extend our sympathy to the family of Senator Kay Hagan on news of her untimely death. We honor her lengthy service to the people of North Carolina as a United States Senator and state Senator. Rest In Peace.

Love seeing businesses and jobs head to North Carolina! @Microsoft is expanding its Charlotte location to create hundreds of new high-paying jobs to our hardworking citizens. Keep it coming! #HighTech

I’m saddened to learn of the passing of Elijah Cummings. Though we only served together a short time it was clear he was a respected and dedicated member whose 23 years of service will leave a lasting legacy. Jo and I extend our deepest condolences to the entire Cummings family.
Thank you for all of your work @SenThomTillis! We are all grateful for the support from POTUS. Looking forward to helping NC rebuild & recover. https://t.co/1sNOEf2uSy

Today I voted against the Democrats’ latest show vote to undermine President Trump’s solid progress toward building the Wall. Democrats are prioritizing illegal immigrants over our vets. Make no mistake there is a crisis at the border & I’m with the President. https://t.co/98MEghSbwP
Thanks @RepMarkWalker! Looking forward to working together to secure our borders and ensure safety for American families. https://t.co/iWUoA5WdL5
Setting up operations in the Washington D.C. office. Honored and privileged to serve the Ninth District of North Carolina in the U.S. House of Representatives!
